mods.abstract: This is a bust length portrait of a rather sad-eyed old negress with a long narrow face who wears large gold loop earrings and a tignon which covers all but little of her kinky hair. The dress of the subject, who is turned a quarter to the left from the picture plane, is distinguished by its decorative collar which is a double layer of pointed scallops
mods.note: the subject was the author's own childhood nanny, "Kankee", who was a French speaking servant in the Wogan household.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art

titleInfo.title: Caroline Wogan Durieux Works of Art
